stimulusHtml: For his installation En la Barberia no se Llora (No Crying Allowed in the Barbershop), Pepon Osorio combined a barbershop with various types of imagery primarily in order to
choicesHtml: make the audience aware of the consequences of colonialism
promote pride in the audience about their cultural heritage
engage the audience in a reflection about cultural gender norms
confront the audience with the legacy of dictatorships
